# MainMenuChanger
 Configurable mod that lets you change how the Main Menu is laid out.
 
<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mainmenuchanger"><img src="https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/full_636158_downloads.svg"></a>
<a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/mainmenuchanger"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&label=&suffix=%20Downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/yCd6z53x&style=flat&color=242629&labelColor=5ca424" alt="Modrinth"></a>

<a href="LICENSE"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/Stereo528/MainMenuChanger?style=flat&color=242629&labelColor=9c5df4"></a>
<a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/mainmenuchanger/versions"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&label=%20&query=game_versions&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/yCd6z53x&style=flat&color=242629&labelColor=5ca424"></a>

---

This mod allows you to:

- Halve the size of the splash 
- Change the Copyright text to say `© Mojang AB`
- Reduce the version text, for example, `Minecraft 1.19/Fabric (Modded)` to `1.19 Fabric`
- Mod Count (without ModMenu)¹
- Disable the Realms button and Realm Notifications
- and lastly, disable the Language and Accessibility buttons from the main menu

All with a handy-dandy config!

¹ ModMenu will still display mod count if both `shorter_version_text` and `mod_count` are set to false, as it employs the vanilla behavior, which ModMenu overwrites, but can be set to not via its config.
